line_1: I chill'd you not with cold reserve,
line_2: Tho' what your merit might deserve,

line_1: Done because good, without a mean reserve.
line_2: From the nice Rules of Honour none should swerve;

line_1: Whilst even there, you praise with such Reserve,
line_2: As if you'd in the midst of Plenty starve,

line_1: Whilst even there, you praise with such Reserve,
line_2: Tho' ne'er so liberally we Authors carve.

line_1: Hope shall have patience in reserve.
line_2: And watchful faith the flame preserve;

line_1: Saving some double meaning in reserve;
